basic.name: Overkill (Q)
basic.description: Deal 552 damage to the target and 276 damage to nearby targets over 4 seconds. Reactivate to select a new target. Can move and use Abilities while Channeling. {highlight}Overkill is also affected by Minigun.{/highlight}

basic.name: Frag Grenade (W)
basic.description: Lob a grenade that deals 256 damage, knocking enemies away.

heroic.name: Commandeer Odin (R)
heroic.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.

heroic.name: Drakken Laser Drill (R)
heroic.description: {highlight}Tychus calls a the Drakken Laser on the Halls of the Storm, targetting the closest enemy unit to Tychus dealing 142(+4% per level) damage every second, it will change target every 3 seconds or instantly if the target dies. Activating Drakken Laser empowers it selecting a target and after 2 seconds Drakken Laser will fire a heavy damage continuous damage laser on the target position and initially stunning targets for 0.5 seconds that lasts 3 seconds. {/highlight}

trait.name: Minigun (T)
trait.description: Activate to have Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2.5% of their maximum Health. Lasts 3 seconds. {highlight}You can reactive minigun to start it earlier.{/highlight}

1.name: Stun and Gun
1.description: {highlight}At the end of Run and Gun, enemies in front of Tychus will be stunned for 0.75 seconds and will have their physical armor reduced by 40 for 2 seconds, as Tychus hits them with the butt of his minigun.{/highlight}

1.name: Dash
1.description: Increase the range of Run and Gun by 50%. When cast, increase Tychus's Movement Speed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

1.name: Press the Advantage
1.description: Increase Tychus's Basic Attack range by 1. {highlight}Hitting the same target will increase Tychus attack speed by 2% for each basic attack he hits it. Bonus reset every time he hits another target.{/highlight}

4.name: In the Rhythm
4.description: Quest: While Minigun is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increase future Minigun durations by 0.03 seconds.

4.name: The Bigger They Are...
4.description: Increase the damage bonus to 4% while enemy Heroes are above 30% Health, but Minigun no longer has any effect on targets below 30%.
passives: {highlight}Reduces the cooldown of Minigun by 4 seconds after using Run and Gun{/highlight}

4.name: That's the Stuff!
4.description: Minigun heals Tychus for 100% of the bonus damage dealt after it expires.

7.name: Melting Point
7.description: Enemies hit by Frag Grenade take an additional 75 damage over 3 seconds. This damage is increased by 100% against Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

7.name: KD9a Implosion Core
7.description: {highlight}Tychus grenade will pull targets to it's center now.{/highlight}

7.name: Quarterback
7.description: Increases Frag Grenade's range by 50%. {highlight}Reduces armor of enemy heros hit by 15 for 3 seconds.{/highlight}

10.name: Commandeer Odin
10.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.

10.name: Drakken Laser Drill
10.description: {highlight}The Drakken Laser Drill now spawns at the Halls of the Storm and targets the closest enemy unit to Tychus, dealing 142 (+4% per level) damage per second. It will switch targets every 3 seconds or instantly if the current target dies. Activating the Drakken Laser Drill allows you to select a target. After 2 seconds, the laser will fire a high-damage continuous beam at the target's position, stunning enemies for 0.5 seconds and dealing damage over 3 seconds. {/highlight}

13.name: Armor Piercing Rounds
13.description: Each time Overkill hits an enemy, its damage against them is increased by 15%, stacking up to 60% bonus damage.

13.name: OverExtend
13.description: {highlight}After expiring overkill does an extra hit applying a decaying slow on every enemy hero of 75% for 2.5 seconds. {/highlight}

13.name: Can do this all day
13.description: Reduce Overkill's cooldown by 5 seconds {highlight} if you finish casting Overkill{/highlight}. While Channeling Overkill, Tychus gains 40 Armor.

16.name: Spray 'n' Pray
16.description: Overkill Slows enemy Movement Speed by 25% and its range is increased by 25%.

16.name: Titan Grenade
16.description: Frag Grenade deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 5% of their maximum Health. Each enemy Hero hit by Frag Grenade reduces its cooldown by 1 second.

16.name: Sizzlin' Attacks
16.description: Basic Attacks deal bonus damage to Heroes equal to 1% of their maximum Health. Stacks with Minigun.

20.name: Big Red Button
20.description: Odin lasts 50% longer and Ragnarok Missiles also launches a Nuclear Missile which lands 2.5 seconds later, dealing 319 damage in its area.

20.name: Focusing Diodes
20.description: {highlight}Focusing Heroes will deal extra 3% damage to health per second.{/highlight}

20.name: Bob and Weave
20.description: Run and Gun and Odin's Thrusters gain 2 additional charges and reduces Run and Gun's Mana cost from 50 to 25. After using Run and Gun, increase Tychus's Basic Attack range by 1.5 for 4 seconds.

20.name: Stepping rock
20.description: {highlight}Tychus grenade will bounce 2 times, exploding on each one of the bounces{/highlight}
